/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with modern buildings, their curved roofs adding a unique architectural element to the cityscape. The buildings are predominantly beige and brown, blending harmoniously with the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is devoid of people, adding a sense of tranquility amidst the urban setting. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of modern architecture and natural beauty that characterizes Beijing.
